span.span: Represents a project with design time semantics.

span.span: This class can load project files, edit items and properties and build projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向全局项目集合提供源项目文件的完整路径 (通常通过保存项目) 时, 此项目将添加到全局项目集合中。This project is added to the global project collection when it is given the full path to the source project file, typically by saving the project.

summary.span: 使用给定的项目根和全局项目集合的全局属性以及默认工具版本，构造一个空项目并对其进行计算。

span.span: Constructs an empty project and evaluates it using the given project root and the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向此项目或给定的项目根提供源项目文件的完整路径时, 此项目将添加到全局项目集合中。This project is added to the global project collection when either this project or the given project root is given the full path to the source project file. 如果计算失败, 将引发 Microsoft.build.buildengine.invalidprojectfileexception。Throws InvalidProjectFileException if the evaluation fails. 如果已在项目集合中加载了等效项目, 则会引发 InvalidOperationException。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already an equivalent project loaded in the project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项目将添加到全局项目集合中。The project is added to the global project collection. 如果项目集合中已经存在用于计算此源项目文件的项目, 则会引发 InvalidOperationException。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already a project in the project collection that evaluates this source project file. 可能引发与 IO 相关的异常。May throw IO-related exceptions.

summary.span: 将使用给定的全局属性和给定的工具版本计算源代码。

span.span: The source code is evaluated with the given global properties and given tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向此项目或给定的项目根提供源项目文件的完整路径时, 此项目将添加到给定的项目集合中。This project is added to the given project collection when either this project or the given project root is given the full path to the source project file. 如果计算失败, 将引发 Microsoft.build.buildengine.invalidprojectfileexception。Throws InvalidProjectFileException if the evaluation fails. 如果已在项目集合中加载了等效项目, 则会引发 InvalidOperationException。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already an equivalent project loaded in the project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以后可以添加任何元数据。Any metadata can be added later. 如果通配符表达式已包含新项, 则不会修改项目源。Does not modify the project source if a wildcard expression already includes the new item. 评估会尽力进行。Evaluation takes place on a best-effort basis. 在新项后面的项目源中定义的项可用于计算。Items that are defined in the project source following the new item may be used for evaluation. 仅评估此项。Only this item is evaluated. 可能依赖于它的其他项不受影响。Other items that might depend on it are not affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将项追加到不具有条件并且没有子级或者其第一个子级为同一类型的项的第一个项组。Appends the item to the first item group that does not have a condition and has either no children or whose first child is an item of the same type. 按最大努力计算:-使用所有项展开。Evaluates on a best-effort basis: -expands with all items. 可以使用在新项下的 XML 中定义的项, 即使在实际计算中不是这样。Items that are defined in the XML below the new item may be used, even though in a real evaluation they would not be. 仅评估此项。Only this item is evaluated. 可能依赖于它的其他项不受影响。Other items that might depend on it are not affected. 这是一种很方便的方法, 它不一定会使项目处于完全一致的状态, 直到重新评估。This is a convenience that it is understood does not necessarily leave the project in a perfectly self consistent state until reevaluation.

summary.span: 获取在计算过程中遇到的所有项定义元数据。

span.span: Gets all item definition metadata encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 在计算过程中遇到的所有项定义元数据。

span.span: All item definition metadata encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 这不包括其条件计算结果不为 true 的任何元素，也不包括自上次计算以后添加的任何项定义元数据。

span.span: This does not include any elements whose conditions did not evaluate to true, nor any item definition metadata added since the last evaluation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在第二个计算传递过程中读取项元数据。Item metadata is read during the second evaluation pass. 不同于 ItemDefinitions 属性返回的元数据, 将对此元数据进行排序, 并包括随后使用相同的名称和项类型重写的任何元数据。Unlike metadata returned by the ItemDefinitions property, this metadata is ordered, and includes any metadata subsequently overridden with the same name and item type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllEvaluatedItems As ICollection(Of ProjectItem)

summary.span: 获取可枚举在计算过程中遇到的所有项的枚举器。

span.span: Gets an enumerator over all items encountered during evaluation.

summary.span: 在进行第三轮计算时读取这些项。

span.span: These are read during the third evaluation pass.

value.span: 计算过程中遇到的所有项的枚举器。

span.span: An enumerator over all items encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 在进行第三轮计算时读取这些项。

span.span: These are read during the third evaluation pass.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 Items 属性返回的项不同, 这些项与在计算过程中遇到的所有其他项有关, 而不只是针对相同项类型的项进行排序。Unlike those items returned by the Items property, these are ordered with respect to all other items encountered during evaluation, not just ordered with respect to items of the same item type. 在某些应用程序中, 这种完整的相互排序非常重要, 此类主机可以使用此属性。In some applications, this complete mutual ordering is significant, and such hosts can use this property. 枚举不包括其条件计算结果不为 true 的任何元素, 也不包括自上次计算后添加的任何项。The enumeration does not include any elements whose conditions did not evaluate to true, nor does it include any items added since the last evaluation.

span.span: A collection of possible property values for properties used to evaluate conditions found on properties, property groups, imports, and whens.

value.span: 该集合采用规范格式。

span.span: The collection is in canonical form.

value.span: 条目的名称是要计算的属性的名称，值是可能的属性值的列表。

span.span: The name of the entry is the name of the property to be evaluated, and the value is a list of possible property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 如果项目中的属性上存在以下情况:Condition = "' $ (Configuration)|$ (Platform)" = = "Debug|x86" "Condition =" ' $ (Configuration) ' = = ' Release ' "该表将使用 {" Configuration "、{" Debug "、" release "}} {" Platform "、{" x86 "}}Studio 来确定项目中定义的配置For example, if the following conditions existed on properties in a project: Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)' == 'Debug|x86'" Condition="'$(Configuration)' == 'Release'" the table would be populated with { "Configuration", { "Debug", "Release" }} { "Platform", { "x86" }} This collection is used by Visual Studio to determine the configurations defined in the project

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很少需要显式调用此方法, 因为影响项目的所有编辑会自动将其标记为已修改。It is seldom necessary to call this method explicitly, because all edits affecting a project automatically mark it as modified. 但有时, 必须调用此方法。Sometimes, however, this method must be called. 例如, 项目可能有一个导入元素, 其条件依赖于磁盘上存在的文件。For example, a project may have an Import element whose condition depends on a file that exists on a disk. 如果该文件不存在于计算时, 并且在计算后创建, 则该项目必须显式标记为已修改。If that file does not exist at evaluation time, and it is created after evaluation, then the project must be explicitly marked as modified. 方法使用此属性来确定是否需要进行评估。The method uses this property to determine if an evaluation is necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包含该项的项组为空, 则它也将被删除。If the item group containing the item becomes empty, it is also removed. 如果项源自通配符或分号分隔的表达式, 则该表达式将首先展开为多个项。If the item originates from a wildcard or semicolon-separated expression, the expression is first expanded into multiple items. 项目已更新, 但在重新评估之前不会进行进一步的评估。The project is updated, but no further evaluation occurs until reevaluation. 例如, 如果删除了类型为 "i" 的项, 则在重新评估之前, 不会修改从 "@ (i)" 计算得出的 "j"。For example, if an item of type "i" is removed, "j" which is evaluated from "@(i)" is not modified until reevaluation.
